reviews.review_msg: Aidan is the TM for this class and does not respond to any posted questions. Says that specific material will be on the midterm and then it is not. There are mandatory tutorials and quizzes every week and the questions on quizzes and midterms are almost set up to trick you. Some Qs even are from CHs you have not done yet. DON'T take online version.

Aidan is the TA for this course. My friends and I took this class as we thought it would be a good elective. NO, the class is specifically for other programs because if you're a crim major you cannot take it. NOT AN ELECTIVE. SO MUCH WORk even though it's online, every week there is a tutorial which defeats the purpose. 3 credits but worth 4.
